ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 117
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had a kraken targetted before.  I believe it does exist, though just like Nessie, I never was able to get a good look at it, probably due to the huge
ygData.messageBody:
I've had a kraken targetted before. I believe it does exist, though
just like Nessie, I never was able to get a good look at it,
probably due to the huge yellow streak running down my back.

>
> From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>
> > From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
> >
> > Mayhong Mistmoore(sp) has been beated on most servers, at least the old
> > school ones. The kraken or whatever the name of it is, does not
> > exist....as of 3 days ago when i and my guildmates last did a check for
> > it.
>
> Really? Did it ever exist, or was it just one of those fables people tell
> newbies to scare them? :)
>
> >
